co.cask.cdap.client

Class StreamClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.cask.cdap.client.StreamClient

  • @Beta
public class StreamClient
extends Object
    Provides ways to interact with CDAP Streams.

      • asyncSendEvent

        @Deprecated
public void asyncSendEvent(co.cask.cdap.proto.Id.Stream stream,
                             String event)
                    throws IOException,
                           co.cask.cdap.common.StreamNotFoundException,
                           co.cask.cdap.common.UnauthenticatedException,
                           co.cask.cdap.security.spi.authorization.UnauthorizedException
        Deprecated. since 4.0.0. Use asyncSendEvent(StreamId, String) instead.
        Sends an event to a stream. The write is asynchronous, meaning when this method returns, it only guarantees the event has been received by the server, but may not get persisted.
        Parameters:
        stream - ID of the stream
        event - event to send to the stream
        Throws:
        IOException - if a network error occurred
        co.cask.cdap.common.StreamNotFoundException - if the stream with the specified ID was not found
        co.cask.cdap.common.UnauthenticatedException
        co.cask.cdap.security.spi.authorization.UnauthorizedException

        @Deprecated
public void setTTL(co.cask.cdap.proto.Id.Stream stream,

                   co.cask.cdap.common.UnauthenticatedException,

        Deprecated. since 4.0.0. Use setTTL(StreamId, long) instead.
        Sets the Time-to-Live (TTL) of a stream. TTL governs how long stream events are readable.
        Parameters:
        stream - ID of the stream
        ttlInSeconds - desired TTL, in seconds

        IOException - if a network error occurred
        co.cask.cdap.common.StreamNotFoundException - if the stream with the specified name was not found
        co.cask.cdap.common.UnauthenticatedException

        co.cask.cdap.common.UnauthenticatedException
        co.cask.cdap.security.spi.authorization.UnauthorizedException

      • getEvents

        @Deprecated
public <T extends Collection<? super StreamEvent>> T getEvents(co.cask.cdap.proto.Id.Stream streamId,
                                                                 String startTime,
                                                                 String endTime,
                                                                 int limit,
                                                                 T results)
                               throws IOException,
                                      co.cask.cdap.common.StreamNotFoundException,
                                      co.cask.cdap.common.UnauthenticatedException
        Deprecated. since 4.0.0. Use getEvents(StreamId, long, long, int, Collection) instead.
        Reads events from a stream
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of the collection for storing results
        Parameters:
        streamId - ID of the stream
        startTime - Timestamp in milliseconds to start reading event from (inclusive)
        endTime - Timestamp in milliseconds for the last event to read (exclusive)
        limit - Maximum number of events to read
        results - Collection for storing the resulting stream events
        Returns:
        The same collection object as passed in the results parameter
        Throws:
        IOException - If fails to read from stream
        co.cask.cdap.common.StreamNotFoundException - If the given stream does not exists
        co.cask.cdap.common.UnauthenticatedException

      • getEvents

        @Deprecated
public void getEvents(co.cask.cdap.proto.Id.Stream streamId,
                        long startTime,
                        long endTime,
                        int limit,
                        com.google.common.base.Function<? super StreamEvent,Boolean> callback)
               throws IOException,
                      co.cask.cdap.common.StreamNotFoundException,
                      co.cask.cdap.common.UnauthenticatedException
        Deprecated. since 4.0.0. Use getEvents(StreamId, long, long, int, Function) instead.
        Reads events from a stream
        Parameters:
        streamId - ID of the stream
        startTime - Timestamp in milliseconds to start reading event from (inclusive)
        endTime - Timestamp in milliseconds for the last event to read (exclusive)
        limit - Maximum number of events to read
        callback - Callback to invoke for each stream event read. If the callback function returns false upon invocation, it will stops the reading
        Throws:
        IOException - If fails to read from stream
        co.cask.cdap.common.StreamNotFoundException - If the given stream does not exists
        co.cask.cdap.common.UnauthenticatedException
